item.title: New command? (again) REP++
item.dc:creator: @Rskit-kat Rskit-kat
item.description:
@Rskit-kat wrote:

Im adding a new command called shame. Based off of someones shame room. The command im adding sends the person there. Whenever i try the command it says “try entering a name you want to send to shame” What arnt I doing? I added this command to the the client and thats all… its a 317 server
if(command.startsWith(“shame”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“jimmy”)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2008;
     p.toY = 4762;
     p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been shamed by " + playerName);
     sM("You have shamed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to shame..");
            }
        }
        if(command.startsWith("shame") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("tt"))  {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(5);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2008;
     p.toY = 4762;
     p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been shamed by " + playerName);
     sM("You have shamed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to shame..");
            }
        }
        if(command.startsWith("shame") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("medizine"))  {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(5);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2008;
     p.toY = 4762;
     p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been shamed by " + playerName);
     sM("You have shamed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to shame..");
            }
        }

if (command.startsWith(“shame”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
//creates a new client object and fills in its needed paramaters
c.toX = 2008;
c.toY = 4762;
c.teleblock = true;
c.sM(“You have been sent to the shame room for breaking the rules!”);
c.sM(“Maybe someone will release you shortly…”);
c.teleblock = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
sM(“Player succesfully shamed”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll =("[SUCESS]: “+command.substring(5)+” has been jailed for breaking the rules");
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to send to shame”);
}

        }
